lines.text:
[reading from paper at gravesite service]
To us you will exist in the flowers, in the trees, and in all the things of nature that God has given us. Richie, you are now in a world of peace and happiness forever. Pray for us as we pray for you. And somewhere, sometime, we will join you. With love from all your friends.
[she places flowers on Richie's casket and steps back]

[after finding Richie passed out in an arcade]
Richie... what're you doing, man?

[slurred]
Reds.
How many did you take?
[Richie holds up nine fingers... Brick is horrified]
Nine? You took nine reds? What're you tryin' to do? Nobody does nine reds!

[answering phone at home]
Hello?
Mr. Werner?
That's right.

[sternly]
This is Jim Fischer, I'm the principal at the high school. Would you please come over and pick up your son?

[concerned]
What's the matter, is Richie sick or something?
So far this morning, he's threatened the study hall supervisor, was very abusive to me, and tried to attack the school nurse!

[resignedly]
I'll be right over.
[hangs up]

[George has played the tape of a phone call he recorded between Richie and Brick... he shuts it off]
You boys heard enough? Now that's just a sample! I have a few more of these cassettes!

[indignant]
What're you gonna do with them?

[snatching hat from Peanuts' head and shoving it into his chest]
I should tell the police... and that would be the finish of anybody on parole.
[he glares pointedly at a stricken Brick]
But I think the fair thing to do is to call your parents.
Don't call my folks! They got enough problems! Why are you doing this, anyway?
TO SAVE MY SON!

[smiling]
Don't look at me, guys.
Okay, okay... go ahead, tell them! I mean, what do I care? They know all about it!
I don't think that's true!
What if we promise to stop?

I wouldn't believe you. But in spite of that, I'm going to give you another chance. I won't call the police, I won't tell your parents. And in return, Richie isn't to see any one of you anymore... or talk to you on the phone.
[boys pause, defeated]
Okay, say your goodbyes.
[all four go outside]

[after Richie has stumbled home high on reds and pot, Carol turns to George]
What's wrong with him?

[disgusted]
Same thing as always.
[walks down the hall to Richie's room, not seeing him, finds hidden panel in closet leading to cubbyhole where Richie is withdrawing... George grabs him and hauls him out]
Go away! Go away! Leave me alone! STOP IT! STOP IT!
[Richie runs out sobbing and into Carol's arms... she leads him out of the room while George destroys the cubbyhole's contents]

[Carol has come into Richie's room on Christmas Eve to fetch him to socialize with his extended family... he's laying on his bed smoking a joint. Carol is shocked and dismayed]
Put that out. Put it out and get out there and say hello to Grandma and Grandpa.
[Richie doesn't respond]
Oh, please Richie... not tonight. It's Christmas Eve, please. Please get up and come with me.

[slurred]
I can't, Mom... I can't.
[Carol slowly turns and leaves... she and George exchange guilty glances while the guests sing Christmas carols in the living room]

[Richie stumbles out of his room, obviously stoned... George and Carol are watching from the dinner table]
That promise you and your buddies made me didn't last long, did it?
What we do is no business of yours.
Well, then I'll let the police handle it.
[Richie tries to walk past George, who blocks him in]

[snarling]
Get out of my way...
You're not going anywhere!
You better do what I tell you, man!
[pats breast pocket of his jacket]
I got a razor right here, you stand there and I'll use it!

[anguished]
Please! STOP IT! You know, Richie... if you hate us so much, everything we are, everything we believe, then why don't you just go away? Please... please, just go away!
[breaks down in tears]

[to Carol, putting his arm around her]
I'm sorry.
[Richie leaves]

[Richie has taken 'reds' to confront his father about his intervention of going to the police... George has retreated to the basement]
YOU! Did you tell those cops I use dope, huh? HUH?

[Richie throws bucket from basement steps in his father's direction]
Richie, stop it!
I asked you a question! I want an answer, huh?
[picks up an awl and feigns jabs at George]
Did you tell those cops I use dope? You answer me!

[George reaches behind himself to a pistol in his toolbox]
HUH? I got you now, you answer me!

[George produces gun and aims it at Richie]
A gun! Look at this, he's got a gun! Look at that! God! Shoot me!

[hysterical]
STOP IT!
Come on, use it! USE IT USE IT! SHOOT ME!

[screaming... George cocks the gun's hammer]
RICHIE, STOP IT!
SHOOT ME! SHOOT ME! SHOOT ME!
[collapses from his drug-induced rage and drops awl... George kicks it away from him]
RICHIE! RICHIE!
[Richie stumbles upstairs... Carol turns to George]
Oh my God! What are we going to do?

[calmly]
I don't know... I don't know.

[stumbles back downstairs with a knife in his hand]
Shoot me! SHOOT ME! SHOOT ME!

[George takes aim]
SHOOT ME! SHOOT MEEE! SHOOOOT MEEEE!
[George fires gun, Richie screams]
